title: Bug 18777[DND] Inconcistency between copy/paste and DND
description: F21) Create project P12) Create folder f1 in P13) Create file x.txt in f14) Create project P25) Create folder f1 in P26) Create file y.txt in P2/f17) Copy P1/f18) Paste to P2 Get overright dialog and end up with 2 files in P2/f19) Select P1/f1 and drag it to P2 Get P2/Copy of f1
